title: Pelton and MacMahon
description:
Zach and ESPN's Kevin Pelton talk about what's next for the reeling Portland Trail Blazers, then ESPN's Tim MacMahon joins to talk the struggling Mavs, hot Rockets, and streaking Grizz. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
